attributes.action: Reduce home fuel VAT to nil as promised in 1997 prospectus to voters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Your 1997 prospectus told us to expect nil home fuel VAT charges. You have failed in this due to love for EU laws. Remember Lord Kylsant and his year in Wormwood Scrubs for a false prospectus of Royal Mail Steam Packet company Ltd.
Your actions NOW PLEASE is to allow a 5% discount on home fuel bills and this 5% discount to be an allowed expense against the fuel providers VAT bill.
Please act within 7 days of 11th January 2007 keeping MPs working for an extra half hour if you have to, to amend any law or regulation.
